title: Six Sessions of IPL Hair Removal on a Choice of Areas for £119 at Shumaila's London Laser Clinics (Up to £975 Value)
highlights:
• Valid at four locations: Seven Kings(IG3 8RQ), East Ham (E6 3BA), Gants Hill (IG2 6RE), Beehive Lane (IG1 3RD)
  • Valid for one large area: half legs, half arms, back, shoulders, chest, abdomen, extended bikini, full face
  • OR valid for two medium areas: underarms, neck (back), regular bikini, hands and fingers, sideburns, feet and toes
  • Two small areas included with both options: upper lip, chin, ears, eyebrows (in between), cheeks, nipple, fingers, toes
